code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const modules=[{path:'/buses',icon:'üöç',title:'Bus Management',description:'Manage bus fleet, types, and availability'},{path:'/routes',icon:'üó∫',title:'Route Management',description:'Define and manage bus routes with stops'},{path:'/schedules',icon:'‚è∞',title:'Schedule Management',description:'Create and manage bus schedules'},{path:'/timetables',icon:'üìÖ',title:'Timetable Management',description:'View and manage daily timetables'},{path:'/admin',icon:'üõ†',title:'Admin Module',description:'Dashboard and system settings'},{path:'/users',icon:'üë§',title:'User Module',description:'Manage users and view bus details'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"glass-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"module-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"module-icon",children:"\uD83C\uDFE0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Welcome to Bus Transport System"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{marginBottom:'20px',fontSize:'18px'},children:"Smart Transport Management for Modern Cities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modules-grid",children:modules.map((module,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:module.path,className:"module-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"module-icon",children:module.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:module.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:module.description})]},index))})]});};export default Home;
